attributes.title: 🍭🌈AWFULLL💫🌻
attributes.review: This app was the worst thing I’ve ever gotten! I opened it up, and, because I was not prepared to see this orange pumpkin of a man, I suffered from severe emotional trauma! Then it corrupted my phone will a bajillion viruses! SAD.

attributes.title: ✨revolting✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to be informed about what’s happening, instead I was terrified by a jump scare when I opened the app. Very unprofessional 😡

attributes.title: ✨t̾r̾a̾s̾h̾✨
attributes.review: Don't download this. I was walking in my yard then all of a sudden a gorilla came and attached me. I was so scared for my life. Don't download tho... ✨Because we don’t associate with orange hyenas✨

attributes.title: Crazy
attributes.review: I got this app just to support our Cheeto but it hacked my phone. Every time I open the app, a sex offender pops up. Can some one help me?

When I opened the app I was welcomed with trumps little shrimp. My eyes burned out of my scull please I say PLEASE don’t download the app it made my phone crash and kept repeating “WE NEED TO BUILD A WALL” I HATED IT SO MUCH. WHEN WILL THE SIMPSONS PREDICTION COME TRUE?!!

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: The app is just the absolute worst. Every time I open it bad things just happen. Don’t get this app

attributes.title: ✨my eye balls melted ✨
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app my corneas started bleeding and then my pancreas exploded from sheer disgust from the oompa loompa Cheeto man that popped up on the screen. would not recommend 😌✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Slow
attributes.review: Took two days to download and kept spamming ads

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: i really am so interested in what bunker boy has to say but this app single handedly murdered my entire family 😟
